article_title: U.S. health care system given poor ranking (again)

article_metadata.description: A new report offers a comparative look at how some of the world’s wealthiest countries keep their citizens healthy.And once again, the United States has been given a poor ranking.

og.title: U.S. health care system given poor ranking (again)

article_metadata.keywords: Affordable Care Act,Health,health care,health care costs,health care reform,United States
